article_title: Seattle court orders HIV-positive man to stop spreading the virus
article_text: An Oklahoma bill that could send any doctor who performs an abortion to jail headed to the governor on Thursday, with opponents saying the measure is unconstitutional and promising a legal battle against the cash-strapped state if it is approved.

article_metadata.news_keywords: seattle, court, orders, hiv, positive, man, stop, spreading, virus

og.description: An HIV-positive man in Seattle could face jail time if he fails to comply with a court order seeking to prevent him from spreading the disease to his sexual partners.
og.title: Court: Sir, Can You Please Stop Spreading HIV?

twitter.description: An HIV-positive man in Seattle could face jail time if he fails to comply with a court order seeking to prevent him from spreading the disease to his sexual partners.
twitter.title: Court: Sir, Can You Please Stop Spreading HIV?
